tool_description: License plate recognition involves capturing photographic video or images of license plates, whereby they are processed by a series of algorithms that are able to provide an alphanumeric conversion of the captured license plate images into a text entry.

api_list.name: /recognize_url
api_list.description: Send an image URL with the license plate you wish to obtain.

required_parameters.name: image_url
required_parameters.description: An image URL containing the license plate/vehicle you wish to obtain the data.
